snippet.title: Take a Break with Yakuza 6: The Song of Life Minigames
snippet.description: What does a man with the world on his shoulders and a child to look after do to relax and unwind? In Yakuza 6: The Song of Life, Kiryu enjoys a swing of the bat, a jostle of the joystick, or some good old-fashioned mahjong.
